Class RangedWeapon

game.RangedWeapon

Direct Known Subclasses:

extends WeaponItem

Joseph Yu

  • Constructor Details

    • RangedWeapon

      public RangedWeapon​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, int damage, java.lang.String verb)

  • Method Details

    • reload

      public abstract void reload​(Ammo ammo)
      Every RangedWeapon has to be able to reload. Infinite ammo can also be implemented through this method.
      Parameters:
      ammo - Ammo object to be loaded into the RangedWeapon

    • empty

      public abstract void empty()
      If every RangedWeapon can be reloaded, they can be emptied too.

    • getBulletType

      public abstract BulletType getBulletType()
      RangedWeapons reload bullets and this method can return the RangedWeapon's bulletType which is an enum.
      Returns:
      enum BulletType.

    • getMeleeDamage

      public abstract int getMeleeDamage()
      For using in melee ranged.
      Returns:
      Number of damage when the RangedWeapon is used in melee range.

    • getAllowableAction

      public abstract java.util.List<Action> getAllowableAction​(Actor actor)
      This method returns all the allowable actions of the RangedWeapon.
      Parameters:
      actor - Actor that is performing the actions.
      Returns:
      List containing Action objects that the RangedWeapon can allow the Player to perform.

    • damage

      public int damage()
      Description copied from class: WeaponItem
      Accessor for damage done by this weapon.
      Specified by:
      damage in interface Weapon
      Overrides:
      damage in class WeaponItem
      Returns:
      the damage

    • verb

      public java.lang.String verb()
      Description copied from class: WeaponItem
      Returns the verb used for attacking with this weapon, so that it can be displayed in the UI.
      Specified by:
      verb in interface Weapon
      Overrides:
      verb in class WeaponItem
      Returns:
      a third-person present tense verb, e.g. "hits", "zaps"

    • setDamage

      public void setDamage​(int damage)
      This method changes the damage of the RangedWeapon.
      Parameters:
      damage - Damage of the RangedWeapon.

    • setVerb

      public void setVerb​(java.lang.String verb)
      This method changes the verb of the RangedWeapon. E.g. switching from melee to ranged have different verbs.
      Parameters:
      verb - e.g. "punches", "shoots"

    • hasAmmo

      public boolean hasAmmo()
      This method checks whether the RangedWeapon has at least 1 ammo object loaded.
      Returns:
      true or false

    • setBarrelSize

      public void setBarrelSize​(int size)
      This method sets the size of the RangedWeapon.
      Parameters:
      size - Number of Ammo objects the RangedWeapon can hold in its barrel.
